name: Only Human
description:
A top-down pixel adventure game, based on Greek Mythology.

You are Circe, used-to-be the minor goddess of witchcraft before an altercation (Okay, you murdered your husband and kept turning mortal men into animals) caused Zeus to turn you mortal and send you to the island of Aeaea. Now, you must find your way back to becoming immortal, while fighting against the evil spirits the Keres and the Machai - choosing either to slay them, or turn them into an assortment of animals.

All mechanics and coding were implemented by me, some art is mine and some art was used from websites such as OpenGameArt, Itch.io and DeviantArt, credit to whoevers due. Sounds from Freesounds.org, and Only Human 8-bit by 8-bit universe. 

AUT STUDENT PROJECT - 2D GAME PROTOTYPE
